title: (x) Givenchy Typeface ID? - Custom drawn by Paul Barnes {Kai B}
content:
I'm sure this has been answered already but I tried searching these forums and the search function doesn't seem to be working right now.

Does anyone know the typeface used for Givenchy?

Thanks!

comments.content:
Custom drawn, Paul Barnes for Saville.
